mapper.sql: vid, bak, id, softcode, sortnum, status, text, tid
mapper.select:
select count(1) from t_dicvalue where 1=1
AND tid =#{tid}
select count(1) from t_dicvalue where id = #{id} and tid=#{tid}
select count(1) from t_dicvalue where softcode = #{softcode} and tid=#{tid}
mapper.insert: insert into t_dicvalue (vid, bak, id, softcode, sortnum, status, text, tid) values (#{vid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bak,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{softcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tid,jdbcType=BIGINT})

update t_dicvalue
bak = #{bak,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
softcode = #{softcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sortnum = #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where vid = #{vid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_dicvalue set bak = #{bak,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, softcode = #{softcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortnum = #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, text = #{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tid = #{tid,jdbcType=BIGINT} where vid = #{vid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
